title: A Burnt-Out Case
description: Querry, a world-famous architect, is the victim of a terrible attack of he no longer finds meaning in art or pleasure in life. Arriving anonymously at a Congo leper village, he is diagnosed as the mental equivalent of a "burnt-out case", a leper who has gone through a stage of mutilation. However, as Querry loses himself in work for the lepers his disease of mind slowly approaches a cure. author: Graham Greene
